Number of shots (VG-GFX100II vertical battery grip)
PERFORMANCELCDEVF
BOOST1Approx. 1360Approx. 1010
NORMALApprox. 1470Approx. 1240
Total length of footage that can be recorded on a single charge
ModeActual battery life of movie captureContinuance battery life of movie capture
8K 2Approx. 60 minutesApprox. 80 minutes
4K 3Approx. 60 minutesApprox. 90 minutes
FHD 3Approx. 80 minutesApprox. 140 minutes
High-speed movies4 1 EVF FRAME RATE PRIORITY (120P) selected PERFORMANCE. 2 At a frame rate of 29.97 fps. 3 At a frame rate of 59.94 fps. 4 At a frame rate of 120 fps. CIPA standard. Measured using battery supplied with camera and SD memory card. Note: Battery endurance varies with battery charge level and the figures given above are not guaranteed. Battery endur- ance will decline at low temperatures.Approx. 65 minutes
